dcterms:creator: Mahmood Bijankhan
Javad Sheykhzadegan
Mohammad Bahrani
Masood Ghayoomi
dcterms:description: The Bijankhan corpus is the most well-known corpus for Persian G2P and consists of formal sentences. It contains 42,540 sentences with an overall of one million words and their phonemic transcriptions, corrected by phonetic experts.
dcterms:title: Bijankhan corpus

dcterms:description: The Ariana lexicon was used to tag the words in the Bijankhan corpus for the purpose of training the ezafe model. It consists of word entries along with all possible phoneme transcriptions and POS tags in both simple and ezafe forms.
dcterms:title: Ariana lexicon

dcterms:creator: Yasser Mohseni Behbahani
Bagher Babaali
Mussa Turdalyuly
dcterms:description: FarsDat is a dataset used for Persian phoneme sequences conversion based on recurrent neural networks.
dcterms:title: FarsDat
